item.description:
This is a reminder memo of an upcoming Meet Up.

Is anyone interested in watching the UFO Documentary "Fastwalkers"?

In Fastwalkers, you will be treated to a ton of important facts.
This is a reason Fastwalkers is highly recommended to not only avid UFO fans,
but for people who might not know much about the situation.
It's a tremendous learning opportunity, as the film brings to light such facts as
the infra red Mexico Military UFO sightings, nuclear missile UFO events,
contradicting government documentation about UFOs,
and even more surprises that you will have to find out while watching the film.

http://www.alienvideo...

www.alienvideo.net/0702/fastwalkers-dvd.php

B.

http://www.mininova.o...

www.mininova.org/tor/753659

C.

http://www.fastwalker...

www.fastwalkers.com/


D.

http://en.wikipedia.o...

en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fastwalkers

This Meet Up will be held at the SGRA Research Center.

www.sgra-media.org

http://www.sgra-media...

A $5 donation is requested to help to pay for refreshments.
I will find out there who to give the $ to.

They are planning for their December 13 Paracon at the Milford Ho Jos.

http://www.sgra-media...

www.sgra-media.org/wintercon/

I have not been to this new Research Center yet, so I might be walking
Around to get the feel of it.

Many of those in SGRA already know me, so they will let you know
Where I am at.

If you have any paranormal questions, then this is the place to ask them.

Mike B
Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: Many of those in the Research Center know me so ask where I am.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Unknown Zone Members view the UFO Fastwalkers Movie on 11/22
